extendedInfo.description: You ready for multiplayer action? Axis or Allies, victory or defeat, mayo or mustardâ¦ All will be decided in the ultimate FPS showdown, Blitz Brigade!Become one of five highly skilled and totally badass classes and team up with other players to pound your enemies into the dirt and call them mean names. Finally, a true class-based multiplayer FPS game comes to Android!âââââLock 'n' load for team-based FPS action!âââââGIVE AN ONLINE BEATDOWN!âUp to 12 players can battle online in multiplayer gamesâ5 classes: Soldier, Gunner, Medic, Sniper, StealthâControl the battlefield in Domination mode  âFrag everyone from the opposing army in Deathmatch gamesâUse 3 different vehicles for a tactical advantage in battleâFight with over 100 weapons, each made for a specific classâUnique taunts and kill phrases for each character in the gameâVoice Chat to create your game plan in the heat of the actionHONE YOUR KILLER SKILLS IN TRAINING MISSIONSâComplete 120 unique action-packed missionsâLearn to master each class's specialized battle skillsâPilot a Helicopter and rain death from above âHop into a Tank to steamroll the enemy armyâââââWar games just got a whole lot crazier! âââââFor fans of free online action games, class-based multiplayer shooters, first-person shooters, army/war games, or anyone who enjoys a good online fight.Enter the battlefield, get ready for the war, and enjoy hours of fun! Minimum hardware requirements to play Blitz Brigade:	- 1 Ghz CPU	- 512 Mb RAM	- PowerVR SGX540 GPU or equivalent	- 1.4 GB of available memoryFor optimal performance, we recommend restarting your device and closing other applications before playing Blitz Brigade.----Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.comFollow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/GameloftDiscover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.Terms of use : http://www.gameloft.com/conditions/

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Brilliant game. Detailed graphics and smooth gameplay. Needs more vehicles though.  A plane would be nice and also a possible motorbike or quad bike
reviews.author: Jaysun Ubdhoot

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s cool phone and the graphics are amazing compared to other mobile games
reviews.author: jashon noles

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: A very fun and fantastic mulriplayer fps with very high and amazing graphics. Well done Gameloft
reviews.author: Alexi Ayub

reviews.title: Amazing free fps
reviews.comment: This game really is amazing. Doesn\'t lag much even with 8 This game is probably the best free multiplayer fps out there on mobile.Coming from a pc on which I played tf2 a lot, this game is highly entertaining, plus doesn\'t lag much on my HTC sensation XL, even on a map with 7 other players. Download it now! There\'s so much to do as well. One problem though is the fact when I play DMs sms chose the Madagascar ruins my game stops...
reviews.author: Andre-Omari John

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: cant even connect to my account even though i restarted my router and restarted my device please fix this annoying problem

reviews.title: Just awsome great graphics, smooth gaming everthings epic
reviews.comment: Awsome just awsome

reviews.comment: Even better than modern combat, great game, no faults so far, very nice graphics and animations, vehicles are great too

reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.comment: Great game but I wish I could share progress between my two devices, on level 1 on my phone and level 20 on my tablet please help :(

reviews.comment: actually pretty good and entertaining. a little weird to get use to it considering it\'s on a mobile device. this reminds me of tf2. Would be cool to see an enhanced version if this on a console.

reviews.comment: One of the best games I have played on the play store, but I also agree with other people when they say to put more vehicles\tBrill

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Finally a first person shooter that I actually want to play on my android device. Lots of game\'s are fun for a few minutes but I will actually sit down with an android controller hooked to my nexus 7 fhd and play for awhile.

reviews.title: 5 stars if it had wired controller support
reviews.comment: NEEDS wired controller support! Would be a stellar game if it did. I was hoping since modern combat 4 supports my ps3 controller, so would this game.

reviews.title: Will not play without wifi
reviews.comment: I have unlimited 4g lte.....this the reason I ditched my cable/dsl provider.....this game wants to only play over wifi......sure i can go to the shop and buy stuff and do anything else....EXCEPT PLAY!!!!!  1 star for getting me to download

reviews.comment: The play is smooth... The graphics are awesome... The characters are awesome...  everything\'s awesome... Just download...
